name: royalty-fee-registry
description: Royalty Fee Registry for NFT collections
author: LooksRare

scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ looksrare/royalty-fee-registry subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:studio: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --studio looksrare-royalty-fee-registry
scripts.test:lerna: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph test -r
